---

### Problem to solve
Describe the developer or user problem this skill should address.

### Proposed skill name
Suggested skill name (for example, `orchardcore.example-skill`).

### Skill description
A concise description of what guidance or prompt content the skill should provide.

### References or source material
Links to official docs, examples, or sample projects that should inform the skill.

### Additional context
Any other details or constraints to consider.
